short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays weather conditions with a visual representation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay updated with the latest weather conditions in a fun and engaging way! Weather Vibe Extension provides real-time weather updates with a vibrant, animated display. Whether it's sunny, raining, cloudy, or snowing, see the weather come to life right in your browser.

Key Features:
☁️Animated Weather: Enjoy dynamic animations representing different weather conditions, including sunshine, rain, clouds, and snow.
☁️Real-Time Temperature: Instantly view the current temperature at your location displayed prominently.
☁️Powered by OpenWeatherMap API: We use the reliable OpenWeatherMap API to ensure you receive accurate and up-to-date weather information.
☁️User-Friendly Interface: The extension provides an easy-to-use interface with clear weather visuals and temperature readouts.
☁️Seamless Integration: Access your weather updates directly from your Chrome toolbar with a simple click.

Perfect for weather enthusiasts and those who appreciate a visually appealing way to check the forecast. Install now and transform your weather checking experience!

Permissions Required:
☁️Geolocation: To provide accurate weather information based on your current location.

Enjoy the perfect weather experience right from your browser—install our Weather Vibe Extension today!
